name: Absorb
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Acid
effects: Acid lowers the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 18+.

name: Acid Spray
effects: Acid Spray lowers the target's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages.

name: Acrobatics
effects: If the user is not holding an item, Acrobatics instead has a Damage Base of 11 (3d10+10 / 27).

name: Acupressure
effects: Roll 1d6. On a result of 1, raise the target's Attack 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 2, raise the target's Defense 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 3, raise the target's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 4, raise the target's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 5, raise the target's Speed 2 Combat Stages. On a result of 6, raise the target's Accuracy by +2.

name: Aerial Ace
effects: Aerial Ace cannot miss.

name: Aeroblast
effects: Aeroblast is a Critical Hit on an Even-Numbered Roll.

name: After You
effects: After You is a Swift Action. The target takes their turn for the round immediately after the user finishes their turn, ignoring Initiative. After You may only affect a target that has not yet acted that round and can only affect willing targets.

name: Agility
effects: Raise the user's Speed 2 Combat Stages.

name: Air Cutter
effects: Air Cutter is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Air Slash
effects: Air Slash Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Alluring Voice
effects: After this Move has resolved, the user may choose to Confuse foes within 5m that have had any CS raised since the beginning of that foe's last turn. This Effect may trigger only once per Scene.

name: Ally Switch
effects: Ally Switch may be declared during a foe's turn as an Interrupt. The user chooses one willing ally within 6 meters; the target and the user switch places. If the ally was a target of a Move, the user is now the target; If the user was a target of a Move, the ally is now the target.

name: Amnesia
effects: Raise the user's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages.

name: Anchor Shot
effects: The Target is Trapped for 2 rounds. Anchor Shot may only be used from the user's Anchor Token.

name: Ancient Power
effects: On 19+, the user has each of its stats raised by +1 Combat Stage.

name: Apple Acid
effects: The target's Special Defense is lowered by 1 CS.

name: Aqua Cutter
effects: This Move is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Aqua Ring
effects: Aqua Ring covers the user in a Coat that heals the user at the beginning of their turn. The user is healed a Tick of Hit Points each turn.

name: Aqua Step
effects: Raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

name: Armor Cannon
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Aromatherapy
effects: All allies in the burst are cured of one status condition of their choice.

name: Aromatic Mist
effects: All allies in Aromatic Mist's area of effect have their Special Defense raised 1 Combat Stage.

name: Artillerolives
effects: Once per Scene, you may create Slick Hazards in two Blasts 3, anywhere within range. If used on only 1 target, this Move gains the Double Strike keyword, and if Slick Hazards are created, you may create them in a single Blast 5, centered on the target. Hazards and does not have to stop shifting or become Vulnerable from them.

name: Assist
effects: Randomly select another Pokémon on the user's roster and then randomly select a Move that Pokémon knows. Assist's user uses that Move immediately.

name: Assurance
effects: When you hit with Assurance, if Assurance's target has already been damaged by a Move on the same round Assurance is being used, Assurance has a Damage Base of 12 (3d12+10 / 30) instead. This effect may trigger only once per Scene per Target.

name: Astonish
effects: Astonish Flinches the target on 15+. Once per scene, if the target is unaware of the user's presence, Astonish automatically Flinches the target.

name: Astral Barrage
effects: Legal targets hit by Astral Barrage are Slowed for one full round.

name: Attack Order
effects: Attack Order is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Attract
effects: Attract Infatuates the target if its gender is the opposite of the user's. Attract fails when used by or against Genderless targets.

name: Aura Sphere
effects: Aura Sphere cannot miss.

name: Aura Wheel
effects: The user's Speed is increased 1 CS.

name: Aurora Beam
effects: Aurora Beam lowers the target's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 18+.

name: Aurora Veil
effects: Blessing – Any user affected by Aurora Veil may activate it when receiving Damage to resist the Damage one step. Aurora Veil may be activated 2 times, and then disappears.

name: Autotomize
effects: For the remainder of the Encounter, the user's Weight Class is one value lower, to a minimum of 1. If the user can, the user's Speed is raised by +2 Combat Stages.

name: Avalanche
effects: When declaring Avalanche, the user does nothing and may not Shift. At the end of the round, the user Shifts and uses Avalanche on any legal target. If the target damaged the user this round, Avalanche has a Damage Base of 12 (4d10+15 / 40) instead.

name: Axe Kick
effects: Confuses the target on 15+. If this Move misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This Move cannot be used if Gravity is in effect.

name: Baby-Doll Eyes
effects: The target's Attack is lowered 1 Combat Stage.

name: Baneful Bunker
effects: If the user is hit by an attack, the user may use Baneful Bunker. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee ranged, the attacker is Poisoned.

name: Barb Barrage
effects: The target is Poisoned on a 17+. Once a Scene, if Barb Barrage's target has a Status Condition, you may choose to not roll for Five Strike. Instead, treat Barb Barrage as though it automatically rolled an 8 for Five Strike.

name: Barrier
effects: The user creates a Barrier of psychic energy. The user places up to 4 segments of Barrier; each segment must be continuous with another segment, and at least one must be adjacent to the user. These barriers count as blocking terrain and last until the end of the encounter or until they are destroyed. Each Barrier segment is 2 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 2 centimeters thick. Each segment has 20 Hit Points, 15 Damage Reduction, and takes damage as if it was Psychic Typed.

name: Baton Pass
effects: The user is replaced with another Pokémon from their trainer's roster. All Combat Stage, Coats, and [Stratagems] on Baton Pass' user are transferred to the replacement. Baton Pass may be used to switch even if the user is Trapped.

name: Beak Blast
effects: Beak Blast must be declared at the start of the round. If the user is hit by a Melee attack this round, their attacker is Burned. At the end of the round, the user may shift and attack with Beak Blast.

name: Beat Up
effects: The user and up to two allies adjacent to the target may each make a Struggle Attack against the target. These Struggle Attacks hit for Dark-Type Damage instead of their usual Type. Beat Up may trigger Pack Hunt only once, no matter the number of attacks.

name: Beckon
effects: The target immediately Shifts towards the user, forfeiting their next Shift Action. This movement does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity. On 17+, the target additionally is Infatuated with the user and Trapped.

name: Behemoth Bash
effects: The DB of Behemoth Bash increases by +2 for each positive CS the target has, to a maximum of DB 20.

name: Behemoth Blade
effects: The DB of Behemoth Blade increases by +2 for each positive CS the target has, to a maximum of DB 20.

name: Belch
effects: Belch cannot be used if the user has not traded in a Digestion Buff during this Scene.

name: Belly Drum
effects: The user gains +6 Attack Combat Stages, and loses Hit Points equal to ½ of their Max Hit Points.

name: Bestow
effects: The user gives its held item to the target, unless the target is already holding an item. Using Bestow is a Swift Action.

name: Bide
effects: The user may use Bide as a Reaction Move upon being Hit by a Damaging Move. During their next available turn, the user may Shift and then use Bide, causing all Adjacent foes to lose X HP, where X is the amount of Damage taken since declaring use of Bide (Loss of life through effects such as Poison is not ‘Damage').

name: Bind
effects: The user gains a +1 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers, and +2 to Skill Checks made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers or gain Dominance. Whenever the user gains Dominance in a Grapple, the target of the Grapple loses a Tick of Hit Points.

name: Bite
effects: Bite Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Bitter Blade
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Bitter Malice
effects: Legal targets hit by Bitter Malice are Stuck and Trapped until the end of their next turn on a 19+. Once a Scene, if Bitter Malice's target has a Status Condition, you may have Bitter Malice's Damage Base be 12 instead (3d12+10 / 30).

name: Blaze Kick
effects: Blaze Kick Burns the target on 19+, and is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Blazing Torque
effects: Burns all legal targets on 15+.

name: Bleakwind Storm
effects: The target is Flinched on a 15+ and Frozen on a 19+.

name: Blizzard
effects: Blizzard Freezes all legal target on 15+. If the target is in Hailing Weather, Blizzard cannot miss.

name: Block
effects: The target is Stuck and Trapped until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Blood Moon
effects: After dealing damage, the user becomes Slowed and Vulnerable until the end of their next turn.

name: Blue Flare
effects: Blue Flare Burns the target on 17+.

name: Body Press
effects: The user's Defense Stat is added to the damage roll instead of the Attack Stat.

name: Body Slam
effects: Body Slam Paralyzes the target on 15+.

name: Bolt Beak
effects: Against targets with a lower initiative that have not yet acted this round, Bolt Beak deals +10 damage.

name: Bolt Strike
effects: Bolt Strike Paralyzes the target on 17+.

name: Bone Club
effects: Bone Club Flinches the target on 18+.

name: Bounce
effects: The user first Shifts, gaining a +1 Bonus to Movement Speed and to their Jump Capabilities. After the user Shifts, they may attack with Bounce. The target becomes Vulnerable, and is Paralyzed on 16+.

name: Brave Bird
effects: The target is pushed back 2 meters.

name: Breaking Swipe
effects: The target's Attack is lowered 1 CS.

name: Brick Break
effects: Light Screen and Reflect may not be activated in response to Brick Break.

name: Brine
effects: If the target's Hit Points are under 50%, Brine's Damage Base is increased to Damage Base 13 (4d10+10 / 35).

name: Brutal Beatdown
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Bubble
effects: Bubble lowers the target's Speed on 16+.

name: Bubble Beam
effects: Bubble Beam lowers the target's Speed on 18+.

name: Bug Bite
effects: If the target has a stored Digestion Buff or has traded in a Digestion Buff this Scene, the user may gain the effects of the Digestion Buff. This does not count towards the usual limit on the user's Digestion Buffs.

name: Bug Buzz
range: Cone 2 or Close Blast 2, Sonic, Smite
effects: Bug Buzz lowers the Special Defense of all targets on 19+.

name: Bulk Up
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage.

name: Bulldoze
effects: All Legal Targets are lowered 1 Speed Combat Stage.

name: Burn Up
effects: Until the end of the encounter, the user loses its Fire-Type. Pure Fire-Types instead become Normal-Type.

name: Burning Bulwark
effects: If the user is hit by an attack, the user may use this Move. The user is instead not hit by the attack. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the attack's effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee ranged, the attacker is Burned.

name: Burning Jealousy
effects: After Burning Jealousy has resolved, the user may choose to Burn foes within 5m that have had any CS raised since the beginning of that foe's last turn. This Effect may trigger only once per Scene.

name: Butterfly Knife
effects: If this Move is used successfully and consecutively on the same target, the maximum of 16. For example, the first hit would have a DB of 4; the second hit a DB of 8; the third hit a DB of 12; the fourth and further hits a DB of 16. If this Move misses or fails to damage its target, its Damage Base resets.

name: Calm Mind
effects: Raise the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

name: Camouflage
effects: The user changes their Type to match the field. Forests and grassy areas change the user into Grass-Type. Watery areas change the user into Water-Type. Caves and Mountains could change the user into Rock-Type or Ground-Type. An icy terrain would turn the user into Ice-Type. A building may change the user into Steel-Type or Normal-Type. Weather affects what Type the user becomes. Use common sense, if you are having difficult determining what type the user should become, consult the GM.

name: Captivate
effects: Captivate lowers the target's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages. Captivate may not affect something that is the same gender as the user or something that is genderless.

name: Ceaseless Edge
effects: The target is put in a Vortex. Ceaseless Edge is a Critical Hit on a 19+.

name: Charge
effects: If the user performs an Electric Move on their next turn that deals damage, add its Damage Dice Roll an extra time to the damage. Raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

name: Charge Beam
effects: If Charge Beam successfully hits a target, roll 1d20. On a roll of 7+, the user's Special Attack is raised by +1 Combat Stage.

name: Charm
effects: Charm lowers the target's Attack 2 Combat Stages.

name: Chatter
effects: Chatter confuses all targets on 16+.

name: Chilling Water
effects: The target cannot make Attacks of Opportunity for 1 full round and their Attack is lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Chilly Reception
effects: The weather changes to Snowy for 5 rounds and the user may immediately be recalled in the same turn. A new Pokémon may immediately be sent out. Using this Move lets a Trapped user be recalled. If the user is not recalled, their movement this turn does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity instead. NOTE: If you are using the Weathers from Domovoi's Rework, the user's side also gains 2 charges of the [Hailing] Blessing, as if they used Hail or Snowscape.

name: Chip Away
effects: Ignore any Armor, Damage Reduction, or changes in the target's Defense or Special Defense (such as from Combat Stages) when calculating damage.

name: Chloroblast
effects: The user's Hit Points are reduced by 50% of their full Hit Point value. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented or reduced in any way.

name: Circle Throw
effects: The target is Pushed 6 meters minus their Weight Class. On 15+, the target is also Tripped.

name: Clamp
effects: The user gains a +1 Bonus to Accuracy Rolls made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers, and +2 to Skill Checks made to initiate Grapple Maneuvers or gain Dominance. Whenever the user gains Dominance in a Grapple, the target of the Grapple loses a Tick of Hit Points.

name: Clanging Scales
effects: The user adds half their Defense Stat to Clanging Scale's Damage Roll. After the Move is resolved, the user's Defense is lowered by 1 CS.

name: Clangorous Soul
effects: The user loses 1/3rd of their Max Hit Points and has each of its stats raised by +1 Combat Stage.

name: Clayball
effects: The user may push the target up to 2 meters away.

name: Clear Smog
effects: The target's Combat Stages are reset to their default, and all Coats on the target are destroyed. Clear Smog cannot miss.

name: Close Combat
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Coaching
effects: The user and any allies in the Burst have their Attack and Defense raised by 1 CS.

name: Coil
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage, raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage, and the user gains +1 Accuracy.

name: Collision Course
effects: Create Slow Terrain in all squares the user Shifted through during Pass, and in a Burst 1 around the user after finishing movement. The user may ignore this Slow Terrain. Whenever this Move deals Super-Effective Damage to a target, that target treats your Damage Roll as if it was increased by +10.

name: Combat Torque
effects: Paralyzes all legal targets on 15+.

name: Comeuppance
effects: This Move may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging attack. Resolve the triggering attack, with the user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if the user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. The triggering foe then becomes Tripped and you may choose 2 allies. The chosen allies may Disengage 2 meters towards the triggering foe as a Free Action.

name: Confide
effects: The target's Special Attack is lowered 1 Combat Stage.

name: Confuse Ray
effects: The target is Confused.

name: Confusion
effects: Confusion Confuses the target on 19+.

name: Constrict
effects: Constrict lowers the target's Speed 1 Combat Stage. Constrict may be used as a Swift Action against targets the user is Grappling, and automatically hits when performed this way.

name: Conversion
effects: The user becomes the elemental Type of their choice as long as they have a Move that is the same elemental Type until the end of the encounter. Replace all other Types.

name: Conversion2
effects: The user becomes the elemental Type of their choice as long as the Type resists the elemental Type of the Move it last took damage from until the end of the encounter. Replace all other Types.

name: Copycat
effects: Use the Move the target has used on their last turn. You may choose new targets for the Move. Copycat cannot miss.

name: Core Enforcer
effects: Each target has its Ability disabled until the end of the encounter. If a target has more than one Ability, you choose one of them to disable.

name: Corrosive Gas
effects: Targets hit have their current Held Item(s) unable to be used for the remainder of the Scene. In addition, Steel-Type targets hit lose their immunity to Poison until they Faint or Take A Breather; Poison instead counts as neutral against Steel.

name: Cosmic Power
effects: Raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage.

name: Cotton Guard
effects: Raise the user's Defense 3 Combat Stages.

name: Cotton Spore
effects: All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 2 Combat Stages.

name: Counter
effects: Counter may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging Physical Attack. Resolve the Triggering Attack, with Counter's user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if Counter's user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to twice the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. Note that Counter is Physical, and while it cannot miss, it cannot hit targets immune to Fighting-Type Moves.

name: Court Change
effects: All Blessings and Hazards swap which side that they belong to.

name: Covet
effects: Covet takes the target's Held Item or Accessory Slot Item and attaches it to Covet's user, if the user is not holding anything.

name: Crabhammer
effects: Crabhammer is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Crafty Shield
effects: If the user or an Ally within 2 meters of Crafty Shield's user is hit by a Status Move, you may use Crafty Shield as an Interrupt. All targets in Crafty Shield's area- of-effect including the user, are instead not hit by the triggering Move and do not suffer any of its effects.

name: Cross Chop
effects: Cross Chop is a Critical Hit on 16+.

name: Cross Poison
effects: Cross Poison is a Critical Hit on 18+, and Poisons the target on 19+.

name: Crunch
effects: Crunch lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17+

name: Crush
effects: The target becomes Infatuated with the user on 17+.

name: Crush Claw
effects: Crush Claw lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on Even-Numbered Rolls.

name: Crush Grip
effects: For every 10% the target is below their full Hit Points, Crush Grip's Damage Base is reduced by 1.

name: Curse
effects: If the user is not a Ghost Type, Curse has a Frequency of EOT, and when used the user lowers its Speed by -1 Combat Stage, but raises Attack and Defense by +1 Combat Stage each. If the user is a Ghost Type, Curse has a Frequency of Scene, and when used the user loses 1/3rd of their Max Hit Points and a target Pokémon or Trainer within 8 meters of the user becomes Cursed. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented in any way.

name: Cut
effects: Cut ignores up to 5 Damage Reduction (Defenses are not Damage Reduction).

name: Dark Pulse
effects: Dark Pulse Flinches the target on 17+

name: Dark Void
effects: The target falls Asleep. Once per Scene, Dark Void may be used as if its range were "Burst 5, Friendly" instead.

name: Darkest Lariat
effects: This Move ignores the target's positive Defense Combat Stages and all Damage Reduction.

name: Decorate
effects: The target gains +2 CS in both Attack and Special Attack.

name: Defend Order
effects: Raise the user's Defense and Special Defense 1 Combat Stage each.

name: Defense Curl
effects: The user becomes Curled Up. While Curled Up, the user becomes immune to Critical Hits and gains 10 Damage Reduction. However, while Curled Up, the user is Slowed and their Accuracy is lowered by -4. The user may stop being Curled Up as a Swift Action. If the user has Rollout or Ice Ball in their Move List, they do not become Slowed while Curled Up. Furthermore, when using the Moves Rollout or Ice Ball while Curled Up, the user gains a +10 bonus to the damage rolls of those Moves and does not suffer Accuracy Penalties from being Curled Up.

name: Defog
effects: The Weather becomes Clear, and all Blessings, Coats, and Hazards are destroyed. Clear Weather is the default weather, conferring no innate bonuses or penalties of any sort.

name: Destiny Bond
effects: All enemy targets in the burst become Bound to the user until the end of the user's next turn. If a Bound target causes the user to Faint through a Damaging Attack, the Bound target immediately faints after their attack is resolved.

name: Detect
effects: If the user is hit by a Move, the user may use Detect. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects.

name: Diamond Storm
effects: On Even-Numbered Rolls, Diamond Storm raises the User's Defense by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Dire Claw
effects: Dire Claw is a Critical Hit on a 19+. Dire Claw gives the target a Status ailment on a 15+. If this is triggered, roll 1d3; on 1 the target is Poisoned; on 2 the target is Paralyzed; on 3 the target is Flinched.

name: Disable
effects: Disable may be used as a Free Action that does not take up a Command whenever the user is hit by a Move. That Move becomes Disabled for the attacker.

name: Disarming Voice
effects: Disarming Voice cannot miss.

name: Discharge
effects: Discharge Paralyzes all legal targets on 15+.

name: Disorient
effects: Confuses the target on 19+.

name: Dizzy Punch
effects: Dizzy Punch Confuses the target on 17+

name: Doodle
effects: The user gains 1 Ability of their choice from the target, and may also grant that Ability to an ally within range, both for the remainder of the encounter. This Move cannot miss.

name: Doom Desire
effects: Doom Desire does nothing on the turn it is used. At the end of the user's next turn, Doom Desire hits, even if the user is no longer on the field. Doom Desire cannot miss.

name: Double Iron Bash
effects: Double Iron Bash Flinches the targets on 15+. This move is affected by Iron Fist.

name: Double Shock
effects: If the user is an Electric Type, they lose the Electric Type until the start of their next turn.

name: Double Team
effects: The user gains 3 activations of Double Team. The user may either activate Double Team when being targeted by an attack to increase their Evasion by +2 against that attack; or when making an attack to increase their Accuracy by +2 for that attack.

name: Draco Meteor
effects: Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

name: Dragon Ascent
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Dragon Breath
effects: Dragon Breath Paralyzes the Target on 15+.

name: Dragon Cheer
effects: Blessing - Any user affected by this Blessing may activate it when making a successful attack to turn the attack into a Critical Hit against one legal target of their choice. The Blessing may be activated 2 times, then disappears. The first time a Scene a Dragon-Type Pokémon activates this Blessing, that activation does not count towards this limit.

name: Dragon Dance
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

name: Dragon Energy
effects: For each 10% of HP the user is missing, Dragon Energy's Damage Base is reduced by 1.

name: Dragon Rage
effects: If it hits, Dragon Rage causes the target to lose 15 Hit Points. Dragon Rage is Special and interacts with other moves and effects as such (Special Evasion may be applied to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.).

name: Dragon Rush
effects: The target is Pushed 3 meters. Dragon Rush Flinches the target on 17+.

name: Dragon Tail
effects: The target is Pushed 6 meters minus their Weight Class. On a roll of 15+, the target is also Tripped.

name: Drain Punch
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Draining Kiss
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Dream Eater
effects: Dream Eater can only target Sleeping Pokémon or Trainers. After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target. Dream Eater does not wake up sleeping targets.

name: Drill Run
effects: Drill Run is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Drum Beating
effects: The target's Speed is lowered by 1 CS.

name: Dynamax Cannon
effects: The DB of Dynamax Cannon increases by +2 for each positive CS the target has, to a maximum of DB 20.

name: Dynamic Punch
effects: Dynamic Punch Confuses the target. Dynamic Punch ignores the target's Evasion if they are Flanked.

name: Earth Power
effects: Earth Power lowers the Special Defense of all Legal Targets 1 Combat Stage on 16+.

name: Earthquake
effects: Earthquake can hit targets that are underground, including those using the Move Dig.

name: Echoed Voice
effects: If Echoed Voice was used by any Pokémon or Trainer in the Encounter on the previous round, increase its Damage Base by +4. If Echoed Voice was used by any Pokémon or Trainers during both the previous two rounds, increase its Damage Base by +8.

name: Eerie Impulse
effects: The target's Special Attack is lowered 2 Combat Stages.

name: Eerie Spell
effects: The user may choose to Disable the target's last Move used. This effect may only be activated once per Scene.

name: Electric Terrain
effects: The field becomes Electrified for 5 rounds. While Electrified, Pokémon and Trainers touching the ground are immune to Sleep, and Electric-Type attacks used by Pokémon and Trainers touching the ground gain a +10 Bonus to Damage Rolls.

name: Electrify
effects: Until the end of the user's next turn, the target's damaging Water-Type attacks and Melee attacks of any Type deal Electric-Type Damage instead of their usual Type.

name: Electro Ball
effects: The user adds their Speed Stat, including Combat Stages, in addition to their Special Attack when determining the damage dealt by Electro Ball. The Defender in turn subtracts both their Special Defense and Speed Stats from the damage dealt before applying Type Effectiveness.

name: Electro Drift
effects: After dealing damage, the user may Disengage 4 meters in a straight line. Whenever this Move deals Super-Effective Damage to a target, that target treats your Damage Roll as if it was increased by +10.

name: Electro Shot
effects: For 1 round, any ally that enters a square adjacent to the user, or starts movement there, may Disengage into any square of the Area of Effect of this Move without expending Movement, and then continue their Shift. If the user is in Rainy Weather, this Move is a Standard Action.

name: Electroweb
effects: All Legal Targets are lowered 1 Speed Combat Stage.

name: Embargo
effects: The target cannot use or benefit from held items for the remainder of the encounter. Embargo may only affect one target at a time; if Embargo is used on a new target, the previous target is freed from the effect.

name: Ember
effects: Ember Burns the target on 18+.

name: Encore
effects: Roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the target becomes Confused; on a result of 3 or 4 the target becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the target becomes Enraged.

name: Endeavor
effects: The target loses a Tick of Hit Points for each Injury the user has.

name: Endure
effects: If the user is hit by a damaging Move, you may use Endure as a Free Action. If the Move would bring Endure's user down to 0 Hit Points or less, Endure's user instead is set to 1 Hit Point.

name: Energy Ball
effects: Energy Ball lowers the foe's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 17+.

name: Entrainment
effects: The target gains one of the user's Abilities for 3 turns.

name: Eruption
effects: For each 10% of Hit Points the user is missing, Eruption's Damage Base is reduced by 1. Eruption creates a 1 meter burst, but also affects an area 10 meters tall straight up.

name: Esper Wing
effects: Esper Wing is a Critical Hit on an 18+.

name: Expanding Force
effects: After Expanding Force is resolved, you may create Psychic Terrain in a Blast 7, centered on the user, that lasts for 5 turns. Any creatures in those spaces are affected as if by the Field Move Psychic Terrain, rather than any other Field Move. This Effect may trigger only once per Scene.

name: Explosion
effects: The user's Hit Points are set to -50% of their full Hit Point value. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented or reduced in any way. The user's loyalty toward its trainer may be lowered.

name: Extrasensory
effects: Extrasensory Flinches the target on 19+.

name: Facade
effects: If the user is afflicted with a Persistent Status Affliction, Facade's Damage Base is doubled to DB 14 (4d10+15 / 40).

name: Fairy Lock
effects: All legal targets become Trapped and Slowed while the user remains in the encounter. This effect ends if the user switches or is Fainted.

name: Fake Out
effects: You may only use Fake Out with Priority upon joining an encounter; if you do, Fake Out Flinches the target. Switching out resets the requirement of joining an encounter.

name: Fake Tears
effects: Lower the target's Special Defense 2 Combat Stages.

name: False Surrender
effects: False Surrender cannot miss.

name: False Swipe
effects: False Swipe's damage cannot bring a target lower than 1 Hit Point.

name: Feather Dance
effects: All legal targets have their Attack lowered 2 Combat Stages.

name: Feint
effects: If a foe uses a Move with the Shield Keyword in response to one of your actions, you may activate Feint to cause the triggering Move to Fail. Feint is activated as a Free Action.

name: Feint Attack
effects: Feint Attack cannot miss.

name: Fell Stinger
effects: If the user successfully knocks out a target with Fell Stinger, raise their Attack by 2 Combat Stages.

name: Fey Wild
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Fickle Beam
effects:
Roll Accuracy for this Move 3 times. For each target, if one of these rolls succeeds, this Move hits that target. For each successful roll after the first, choose one of the following additional effects:
» That target is Slowed for 1 full round.
» That target is Suppressed.
If one or more of the rolls crit, this Move is a Critical Hit. This Move is 1 step more effective against targets that have hit the user for Super Effective damage since the beginning of their last turn.

name: Fiery Dance
effects: If Fiery Dance successfully hits a foe, it raises the user's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on Even-Numbered Rolls.

name: Fiery Wrath
effects: Fiery Wrath Flinches the target on a 17+. Once per Scene, Fiery Wrath may instead be used as a Fire-Type Move.

name: Fillet Away
effects: The next successful damaging Psychic attack made by the user is automatically a Critical Hit. The user may sacrifice three Ticks of Hit Points. If they do so, choose one: » Fillet Away becomes a Swift Action. » An adjacent Ally gains 3 Ticks of Temporary Hit Points.

name: Final Gambit
effects: Final Gambit lowers the user to 0 Hit Points and causes them to Faint. Final Gambit then deals 1 point of damage to the target for every Hit Point lost by the user. Final Gambit does not cause items to activate.

name: Fire Blast
effects: Fire Blast burns the target on 19+.

name: Fire Fang
effects: Fire Fang Burns or Flinches on 18-19 during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe gets Burned or Flinches. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is Burned and Flinches.

name: Fire Lash
effects: The target's Defense is lowered by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Fire Pledge
effects: If an ally uses Grass Pledge or Water Pledge, you may use Fire Pledge as Priority (Advanced) immediately after their turn to target the same foe. If used in conjunction with Grass Pledge, Fire Hazards are created in a Burst 1 around the target. If used in conjunction with Water Pledge, a Rainbow is created that lasts for 5 rounds. Consult the Pledge keyword for additional details.

name: Fire Punch
effects: Fire Punch Burns the target on 19+ during Accuracy Check.

name: Fire Spin
effects: The target is put in a Vortex.

name: First Impression
effects: You may only use First Impression with Priority upon joining an encounter; if you do, First Impression Flinches the target. Switching out resets the requirement of joining an encounter.

name: Fishious Rend
effects: Against targets with a lower initiative that have not yet acted this round, Fishious Rend deals +10 damage.

name: Fissure
effects: Roll 1d100. This roll may not be modified in any way. If you roll X or lower, the target Faints. X is equal to 30 + The User's Level - The Target's Level.

name: Flail
effects: For each Injury the user has, Flail's Damage Base is increased by +1.

name: Flame Burst
effects: Any Trainers or Pokémon cardinally adjacent to the target lose 5 Hit Points.

name: Flame Charge
effects: Raise the user's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

name: Flame Wheel
effects: Flame Wheel Burns the target on 19+.

name: Flamethrower
effects: Flamethrower Burns the target on 19+.

name: Flare Blitz
effects: Flare Blitz Burns the target on 19+.

name: Flash
effects: The Accuracy of all Legal Targets is lowered by -1.

name: Flash Cannon
effects: Flash Cannon lowers the target's Special Defense by 1 Combat Stage on 17+.

name: Flash Step
effects: This Move cannot miss. Before attacking, the user may Teleport 4 into a square adjacent to a foe as a Shift Action.

name: Flatter
effects: The target's Special Attack is raised by +1 Combat Stage. Flatter Confuses the target.

name: Fleur Cannon
effects: Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

name: Fling
effects: The user throws a held item, determining the effect of Fling.

name: Flip Turn
effects: If Flip Turn successfully hits its target, the user deals damage and then immediately is returned to its Poké Ball in the same turn. A New Pokémon may immediately be sent out. Using Flip Turn lets a Trapped user be recalled.

name: Floral Healing
effects: The target regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value. If the field is Grassy Terrain, the target gains 2/3 of its full Hit Point value instead.

name: Flower Shield
effects: All Grass Type Pokémon in Flower Shield's area of effect have their Defense raised by +2 Combat Stages.

name: Flower Trick
effects: This Move cannot miss. If this Move hits, it is a Critical Hit.

name: Flying Press
effects: Flying Press may deal Flying Type damage if the user wishes.

name: Focus Blast
effects: Focus Blast lowers the target's Special Defense 1 Combat Stage on 18+.

name: Focus Energy
effects: The user becomes Pumped. While Pumped, the user's Critical Range is extended by 2, or 18+ if the Critical Range is not otherwise extended. Being switched will cause this effect to end.

name: Focus Punch
effects: Use of Focus Punch must be declared as a Priority (Limited) action at the beginning of the round. Nothing happens at this time. At the end of the round, if the target hasn't been hit by an attack dealing damage equal to at least 25% of the user's Maximum Hit Points, the user may Shift and use Focus Punch. Focus Punch's Frequency is not expended if it is negated by an attack.

name: Follow Me
effects: Until the end of the user's next turn, all Foes must target the user when using a Move that targets their opponents. This effect ends if the user is Fainted or Switched out.

name: Force Palm
effects: Force Palm Paralyzes the target on 18+.

name: Foresight
effects: Foresight may be activated as a Swift Action on the user's turn. For the rest of the turn, the user's Normal-Type and Fighting-Type Moves can hit and affect Ghost-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.

name: Forest's Curse
effects: The target gains the Grass Type in addition to its other Types for 5 turns.

name: Foul Play
effects: The target reveals its Attack stat. When calculating damage, add the target's Attack stat instead of the user's Attack stat.

name: Freeze-Dry
effects: When calculating Weakness and Resistance for Freeze-Dry, Water-Typed targets calculate damage as if Water was weak to Ice.

name: Freezing Glare
effects: Freezing Glare Freezes the target on a 19+. Once per Scene, Freezing Glare may instead be used as an Ice-Type Move.

name: Frost Breath
effects: If Frost Breath hits, it is a Critical Hit.

name: Frustration
effects: Frustration's Damage Base is equal to 9 minus the user's Loyalty Value. Using Frustration may make your Pokémon dislike you.

name: Fury Cutter
effects: If Fury Cutter is used successfully and consecutively on the same target, the Damage Base is increased by +4 to a maximum of 16. For example, the first hit would have a DB of 4; the second hit a DB of 8; the third hit a DB of 12; the fourth and further hits a DB of 16. If Fury Cuter misses or fails to damage its target, its Damage Base resets.

name: Fusion Bolt
effects: If Fusion Flare was used this round or last round by any participant of the encounter, Fusion Bolt has its Damage Base increased by +3.

name: Fusion Flare
effects: If Fusion Bolt was used this round or last round by any participant of the encounter, Fusion Flare has its Damage Base increased by +3.

name: Future Sight
effects: Future Sight does nothing on the turn it is used. At the end of the user's next turn, Future Sight hits, even if the user is no longer on the field. Future Sight cannot miss.

name: Gastro Acid
effects: The target's Ability is disabled until the end of the encounter. If the target has more than one Ability, you choose one of them to disable.

name: Gear Up
effects: All targets that are Steel-Typed receive +1 Attack and Special Attack Combat Stages

name: Giga Drain
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Gigaton Hammer
effects: After dealing damage, the user becomes Slowed and Vulnerable until the end of their next turn.

name: Glacial Lance
effects: Legal targets hit by Glacial Lance are Stuck and Trapped until the end of their next turn.

name: Glaciate
effects: All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 1 Combat Stage. On an Even-Numbered Roll, all Legal Targets on the ground are Slowed.

name: Glaive Rush
effects: On hit, you may choose to become Vulnerable for 1 full round. If you do, this attack is one step more effective. Additionally, the next successful damaging attack against you while Vulnerable this way is automatically a Critical Hit.

name: Glare
effects: Glare Paralyzes the target.

name: Glint
effects: The target cannot make Attacks of Opportunity for 1 full round and their Attack is lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Grass Knot
effects: Grass Knot's Damage Base is equal to twice the target's Weight Class.

name: Grass Pledge
effects: If an ally uses Fire Pledge or Water Pledge, you may use Grass Pledge as Priority (Advanced) immediately after their turn to target the same foe. If used in conjunction with Fire Pledge, Fire Hazards are created in a Burst 1 around the target. If used in conjunction with Water Pledge, the target and all foes adjacent to the target are slowed and have their Speed reduced by 2 Combat Stages. Consult the Pledge keyword for additional details.

name: Grass Whistle
effects: The target falls Asleep.

name: Grassy Glide
effects: If the user is on Grassy Terrain, Grassy Glide may be used with Priority. After Grassy Glide has been resolved, the user may choose to create Grassy Terrain in the spaces Passed over (including those it started and ended in), that lasts for 5 turns. Any creatures in those spaces are affected as if by the Field Move Grassy Terrain, rather than any other Field Move.

name: Grassy Terrain
effects: The area becomes Grassy for 5 rounds. While Grassy, all Pokémon and Trainers standing on the ground recover a Tick of Hit Points at the start of every turn, and Grass-Type attacks performed by grounded Pokémon and Trainers gain a +10 bonus to Damage Rolls.

name: Grav Apple
effects: The target's Defense is lowered by 1 CS.

name: Gravity
effects: For 5 rounds, the area is considered Warped. While Warped, Moves that involve the user being airborne may not be used. Pokémon cannot use Sky or Levitate Capabilities to end their turn at an altitude higher than 1 meter. Flying-Types and Pokémon with the Ability Levitate are no longer immune to Ground-Type Moves. All Accuracy Rolls receive a +2 Bonus.

name: Growl
effects: Growl lowers all Legal Targets Attack 1 Combat Stage.

name: Growth
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage and raise the user's Special Attack 1 Combat Stage. If it is Sunny, double the amount of Combat Stages gained.

name: Grudge
effects: You may use Grudge as an Interrupt when a Damaging Attack causes the user to faint. Grudge is activated as a Free Action (does not take up a Command). The attack is resolved as usual, and the user Faints. The attacker that caused the user to Faint becomes Suppressed for the remainder of the encounter; switching and Taking a Breather does not end Suppression when used this way.

name: Guard Split
effects: The target loses 5 Defense and 5 Special Defense. If they do, the user gains 5 Damage Reduction. These effects last until the end of the scene.

name: Guard Swap
effects: The user and the target trade Combat Stage values for the Defense Stat, and then for the Special Defense Stat.

name: Guillotine
effects: Roll 1d100. This roll may not be modified in any way. If you roll X or lower, the target Faints. X is equal to 30 + The User's Level - The Target's Level.

name: Gunk Shot
effects: Gunk Shot Poisons the Target on 15+.

name: Gust
effects: If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Gust can hit them, ignoring Range and has a Damage Base of 8 instead.

name: Gyro Ball
effects: The target reveals their Speed Stat (including Combat Stages). If it is higher than the user's (again, including Combat Stages), subtract the user's Speed Stat from the target's, and apply the difference as Bonus Damage.

name: Hail
effects: The weather changes to Hail for 5 rounds. While it is Hailing, all non-Ice Type Pokémon lose a Tick of Hit Points at the beginning of their turn.

name: Hammer Arm
effects: The user lowers their Speed 1 Combat Stage.

name: Hard Press
effects: If the target's Hit Points are above 50%, this Move's Damage Base is doubled to Damage Base 12 (3d12+10 / 30).

name: Harden
effects: Raise the user's Defense 1 Combat Stage.

name: Haze
effects: The Combat Stages of the user and all Pokémon and Trainers in the encounter are set to their default state (usually 0).

name: Head Charge
effects: The target is Pushed back 2 meters.

name: Head Smash
effects: The target is pushed 2 meters.

name: Headbutt
effects: Headbutt Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Headlong Rush
effects: The user's Defense and Special Defense are each lowered by -1 Combat Stage. Headlong Rush may be used as a Free Action at the end of a Sprint Maneuver taken as a Standard Action, as long as the user Shifted at least 3 meters in a straight line towards the target. When used this way, Headlong Rush Trips the target on a hit.

name: Heal Bell
effects: All targets are cured of any Persistent Status ailments.

name: Heal Block
effects: Until the end of the encounter, the target may not gain Hit Points or Temporary Hit Points from any source. This effect ends if the target is switched out or Takes a Breather.

name: Heal Order
effects: The user regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value.

name: Heal Pulse
effects: Restores 50% of the target's max Hit Points. Heal Pulse's user may not target itself with Heal Pulse.

name: Healing Wish
effects: The user immediately Faints, lowering its HP to 0. The user takes no Injuries from HP Markers when using Healing Wish. The target is immediately cured of up to 3 injuries, healed to their Maximum Hit Points, and has the Frequency of all Moves restored. Healing Wish may target a Pokémon in a Poké Ball. Healing Wish does not restore the Frequency of Healing Wish or Lunar Dance. Injuries healed through Healing Wish count toward the total number of Injuries that can be healed each day, and this healing is limited by the same.

name: Heart Stamp
effects: Heart Stamp Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Heart Swap
effects: The targets trade Combat Stage values for each Stat.

name: Heat Crash
effects: For each weight class the user is above the target, increase Heat Crash's Damage Base by +2.

name: Heat Wave
effects: Heat Wave Burns all Legal Targets on 18+.

name: Heavy Slam
effects: For each weight class the user is above the target, increase Heavy Slam's damage base by +2.

name: Helping Hand
effects: Helping Hand grants the target +2 on their next Accuracy Roll this round, and +10 to the next Damage Roll this round.

name: Hex
effects: Once a Scene, if Hex's target has a Status Affliction, you may have Hex's Damage Base be 13 instead (4d10+10 / 35).

name: Hidden Power
effects: When a Pokémon first obtains the Move Hidden Power, roll 1d20. Hidden Power's Elemental Type will be changed from Normal to Bug on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4; Fairy on 5; Fighting on 6; Fire on 7; Flying on 8; Ghost on 9; Grass on 10; Ground on 11; Ice on 12; Normal on 13; Poison on 14; Psychic on 15; Rock on 16; Steel on 17; Water on 18; and on 19 or 20, reroll until you roll another number. This effect is permanent –if Hidden Power is forgotten and relearned, the chosen Type remains the same.

name: High Horsepower
effects: High Horsepower may be used as a Free Action at the end of a Sprint Maneuver taken as a Standard Action, as long as the user Shifted at least 3 meters in a straight line towards the target. When used this way, High Horsepower gains Smite.

name: High Jump Kick
effects: If High Jump Kick misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This Move cannot be used if Gravity is in effect.

name: Hold Hands
effects: Both the user and the target become Cheered. They may give up the Cheered condition when making a Save Check to roll twice and take the best result.

name: Hone Claws
effects: The user's Accuracy is raised by +1, and the user gains +1 Attack Combat Stage.

name: Horn Drill
effects: Roll 1d100. This roll may not be modified in any way. If you roll X or lower, the target Faints. X is equal to 30 + The User's Level - The Target's Level.

name: Horn Leech
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Howl
effects: The user and all allies in the Burst have their Attack CS raised by 1.

name: Hurricane
effects: Hurricane Confuses its target on 15+. If the target is in Sunny Weather, Hurricane's Accuracy Check is 11. If the target is in Rainy Weather, Hurricane cannot miss. If the target is airborne as a result of Fly or Sky Drop, Hurricane cannot miss.

name: Hydro Pump
effects: The target is pushed away from the user 3 meters.

name: Hydro Steam
effects: This Move does not deal reduced damage in Sunny Weather. It instead deals +10 damage in Sunny Weather. NOTE: If you are using the Weathers from Domovoi's Rework, the [Sun Shining] Blessing may not be activated against this Move.

name: Hyper Drill
effects: Blessings or Moves with the Shield keyword may not be activated in response to this Move.

name: Hyper Fang
effects: Hyper Fang Flinches the target on 19+

name: Hyper Voice
effects: All Legal Targets are pushed back to the squares immediately outside the blast, away from the user.

name: Hyperspace Fury
effects: Interrupts may not be triggered against Hyperspace Fury. The user's Defense is lowered by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Hyperspace Hole
effects: Make and resolve of Hyperspace Hole's attacks separately. In between each attack, the user may Shift using their Teleporter capability, ending the Shift next to a legal target. Interrupts may not be triggered against Hyperspace Hole.

name: Hypnosis
effects: The target falls Asleep.

name: Ice Ball
effects: The user continues to use Ice Ball on each of its turns until they miss any target with Ice Ball, or are not able to hit any target with Ice Ball during their turn. Each successive use of Ice Ball increases Ice Ball's Damage Base by +3 to a maximum of DB 15.

name: Ice Beam
effects: Ice Beam Freezes on 19+ during Accuracy Check.

name: Ice Fang
effects: Ice Fang Freezes or Flinches on 18+ during Accuracy Check; flip a coin to determine whether the foe gets Frozen or Flinches. On 20 during Accuracy Check, the foe is Frozen and Flinches.

name: Ice Hammer
effects: The user's Speed is lowered by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Ice Punch
effects: Ice Punch Freezes the target on 19+ during Accuracy Check.

name: Ice Spinner
effects: All targets are Tripped on a roll of 18+. If the user moves through an area of Terrain, or a Field-range Terrain is active, those effects immediately end.

name: Icebreaker
effects: You may use this Move as if it had the Priority and Pass keywords in the first round after joining an encounter. Switching out resets this requirement.

name: Icicle Crash
effects: Icicle Crash Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Icy Wind
effects: All Legal Targets have their Speed lowered 1 Combat Stage.

name: Imprison
effects: The target is Locked for the rest of the Scene. A Locked target may not use any Moves the user knows. Imprison cannot miss.

name: Incinerate
effects: If a target is holding a Held Item or Main or Off-Hand item, they must either drop it immediately or lose a Tick of Hit Points. This may only cause a target to lose at most one Tick of Hit Points, no matter how many items they were holding.

name: Infernal Parade
effects: Legal targets hit by Infernal Parade are Burned on a 17+. Once a Scene, if at least one of Infernal Parade's targets has a Status Condition, you may have Infernal Parade's Damage Base be 12 instead (3d12+10 / 30).

name: Inferno
effects: Inferno Burns the target. Inferno ignores the target's Evasion if there are no other combatants or Rough or Blocking Terrain within 2 meters of the target.

name: Infestation
effects: The target is put in a Vortex.

name: Ingrain
effects: Ingrain applies a Coat to the user, which has the following effect; the user cannot be pushed or pulled, and cannot be switched out. At the beginning of each of the user's turn, the user gains a Tick of Hit Points.

name: Instruct
effects: The target immediately reuses the attack it performed last, ignoring frequency, as a Free Action. They may choose new targets for the copied attack. Instruct may not be used if the Target's last Move was a Set-Up Move, a Trigger Move, or Instruct, or if the Target is currently affected by Exhaust.

name: Ion Deluge
effects: An ion cloud is dispersed in the targeted area. All Normal-Type Moves targeting into or originating from the area become Electric-Typed Moves.

name: Iron Defense
effects: Raise the user's Defense 2 Combat Stages.

name: Iron Head
effects: Iron Head Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Iron Tail
effects: Iron Tail lowers the target's Defense 1 Combat Stage on 15+.

name: Ivy Cudgel
effects: Ivy Cudgel may be any Type the user currently possesses. Ivy Cudgel is a critical hit on a roll of 18+.

name: Jaw Lock
effects: You may perform a Grapple Maneuver against the target as a Free Action.

name: Judgment
effects: Judgment's Type can be whatever Elemental Type the user wants it to be.

name: Jump Kick
effects: If Jump Kick misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This Move cannot be used if Gravity is in effect.

name: Jungle Healing
effects: The user and any allies in the burst regain Hit Points equal to 1/4 of their Maximum Hit Point Value, and are cured of any Persistent or Volatile Status Conditions.

name: Karate Chop
effects: Karate Chop is a Critical Hit on 17+.

name: Kinesis
effects: If the user or an Ally within 6 meters is about to be hit by an attack, the user may use Kinesis as an interrupt. The triggering Accuracy Roll receives a -4 penalty. This may cause Moves to miss.

name: King's Shield
effects: If the user is hit by an attack, the user may use King's Shield. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee ranged, the attacker's Attack is lowered by 2 Combat Stages.

name: Knock Off
effects: Choose one of the target's Held Items or Accessory Slot Items. It is knocked to the ground.

name: Kowtow Cleave
effects: This Move cannot miss.

name: Laser Focus
effects: The next successful damaging attack made by the user is automatically a Critical Hit.

name: Lash Out
effects: If the user has lost CS from a source other than itself since the end of its last turn, Lash Out is instead DB 15 (4d10 + 20 / 45). Any given foe may be the target of this increased damage only once per Scene.

name: Last Resort
effects: Last Resort can only be used after the user has performed 5 other different Moves in its Move List during a single fight, without being switched out.

name: Last Respects
effects: This Move gains additional Effects depending on the number of allies that have Fainted this Scene. These Effects are cumulative. 1: The target is Flinched on 15+. 2: The target is Cursed on 17+. 3: This Move gains Smite. Once per Scene, this Move may Deal damage of a Type of any of the Fainted allies instead of Ghost. This does not affect whether this Move gains STAB or not.

name: Lava Plume
effects: Lava Plume burns all targets on 16+.

name: Leaf Blade
effects: Leaf Blade is a Critical Hit on 18+.

name: Leaf Storm
effects: Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

name: Leaf Tornado
effects: Small or Medium targets in the central square of the blast are not hit. On 15+, all legal targets have their Accuracy lowered by -1.

name: Leech Life
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Leech Seed
effects: At the beginning of each of the target's turns, Leech Seed's target loses a Tick of Hit Points. Leech Seed's user then gains Hit Points equal to the amount the target lost. Leech Seed lasts until the target faints or is returned to a Poké Ball. Grass Types and targets immune to Grass Attacks are immune to Leech Seed.

name: Leer
effects: All legal targets have their Defense lowered by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Lick
effects: Lick Paralyzes the target on 15+ during Accuracy Check.

name: Life Dew
effects: The user and all allies in the burst regain Hit Points equal to 1/4 of their Maximum Hit Points.

name: Light Screen
effects: Blessing – Any user affected by Light Screen may activate it when receiving Special Damage to resist the Damage one step. Light Screen may be activated 2 times, and then disappears.

name: Liquidation
effects: The target's Defense is lowered by 1 Combat Stage on a 17+.

name: Lock-On
effects: The target is Locked-On. The next Move that the user uses against the Target that requires an Accuracy Check cannot miss. Lock-On's effect, on both the User and Target, is passed on by Baton Pass.

name: Lovely Kiss
effects: The target falls Asleep.

name: Low Kick
effects: Low Kick's Damage Base is equal to twice the target's Weight Class.

name: Low Sweep
effects: Lowers the target's Speed 1 Combat Stage.

name: Lucky Chant
effects: Blessing – Any user affected by Lucky Chant may activate it when receiving a Critical Hit to cause the attack to instead deal damage as if it was not a Critical Hit. Lucky Chant may be activated 3 times, and then disappears.

name: Lumina Crash
effects: The target's Special Defense is lowered by -2 Combat Stages.

name: Lunar Blessing
effects: The user regains hit points equal to 50% of its Hit Point total, cures all of its Status conditions, and gains +2 Evasion.

name: Lunar Dance
effects: The user immediately Faints, lowering its Hit Points to 0. The user takes no Injuries from Hit Point Markers when using Lunar Dance. The target is immediately cured of up to 3 injuries, healed to their Maximum Hit Points, and has the Frequency of all Moves restored. Lunar Dance may target a Pokémon in a Poké Ball. Lunar Dance does not restore the Frequency of Healing Wish or Lunar Dance. Injuries healed through Lunar Dance count toward the total number of Injuries that can be healed each day, and this healing is limited by the same.

name: Lunge
effects: Lunge may be used as a Free Action at the end of a Sprint Maneuver taken as a Standard Action, as long as the user Shifted at least 3 meters in a straight line towards the target. When used this way, Lunge's target receives a -5 penalty to damage rolls for 1 round.

name: Luster Purge
effects: Luster Purge lowers the target's Special Defense by 1 Combat Stage on an Even-Numbered Roll.

name: Magic Coat
effects: If the user is about to get a hit by a Move that does not have a Damage Dice Roll, they may use Magic Coat as an Interrupt. The Interrupted Move's user is treated as if they were the target of their own Move, with the user of Magic Coat as the user.

name: Magic Powder
effects: The target gains the Psychic Type in addition to its other Types for 5 turns.

name: Magic Room
effects: The area becomes Useless for 5 rounds. While Useless, Pokémon may not benefit from the effects of any Held Items, and Trainers cannot benefit from any Accessory-Slot equipment. This does not affect consumable or activated items, only Items with Static effects or Triggers.

name: Magical Leaf
effects: Magical Leaf cannot miss.

name: Magical Torque
effects: Confuses all legal targets on 15+.

name: Magma Storm
effects: The target is put in a Vortex; this effect occurs even if Magma Storm misses its target.

name: Magnet Bomb
effects: Magnet Bomb cannot miss.

name: Magnet Rise
effects: The user gains the Levitate Ability for 5 turns. Magnet Rise may be activated as a Swift Action if the user is otherwise given an action that consumes a Command.

name: Magnetic Flux
effects: Choose +1 or -1. All targets that are Electric-Type or have the Magnetic Capability receive that many Defense and Special Defense Combat Stages.

name: Magnitude
effects: When you use Magnitude, roll 1d6. Magnitude's Damage Base is equal to 5+X, where X is the value of the d6. Magnitude can hit targets that are underground, including those using the Move Dig.

name: Make It Rain
effects: The user's Special Attack is lowered by -1 Combat Stage. Once per Day, this Move scatters metal coins equal in value to 1d8 times the user's Level. If it is a trainer battle, the winner gets to pick up the coins.

name: Malignant Chain
effects: The target is Poisoned. Then, choose an ally. That ally and the target become Linked to each other. Whenever the Linked ally takes damage, the Linked foe loses a Tick of Hit Points. This effect ends when the user is Fainted or the Scene ends.

name: Mat Block
effects: If the user or an adjacent ally is hit by a damaging attack, the user may use Mat Block. The attack instead does not hit any targets, and it deals no damage and no has effects. You may only use Mat Block during the first round of an encounter.

name: Matcha Gotcha
effects: After the targets take damage, choose one of the targets, the user gains HP equal to half of the damage they dealt to that target. Matcha Gotcha Burns all Legal Targets on 17+.

name: Me First
effects: If an opponent declares a Damaging Attack against the user, and Me First's user has a higher Speed stat then the target, the user may use Me First as an Interrupt. The User will then use the same Move the triggering foe was about to use on that foe.

name: Mean Look
effects: The user casts a foul spell on the target, causing it to become Trapped and Slowed for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Meditate
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage.

name: Mega Drain
effects: After the target takes damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the damage they dealt to the target.

name: Mega Kick
effects: The target is Pushed 2 meters.

name: Megahorn
effects: The target is pushed 1 Meter.

name: Memento
effects: Memento may be used as a Free Action when the user becomes Fainted. Memento's target has each of their stats lowered by -2 CS.

name: Metal Burst
effects: Metal Burst causes all targets in the burst to lose Hit Points equal to the total amount of direct Damage the user has taken since the beginning of this Round. Metal Burst cannot miss.

name: Metal Claw
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 18+.

name: Metal Sound
effects: All Legal Targets have their Special Defense lowered 2 Combat Stages.

name: Meteor Mash
effects: Raise the user's Attack 1 Combat Stage on 15+.

name: Metronome
effects: Metronome randomly uses any other Move except for After You, Assist, Bestow, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, King's Shield, Metronome, Me First, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Powder, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Snore, Spiky Shield, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, and Wide Guard. The GM helps to pick the random Move.

name: Mighty Cleave
effects: The user gains +10 Damage Reduction for 1 full round. Interrupts may not be activated in response to this Move.

name: Milk Drink
effects: The target regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value. The user may target themselves with Milk Drink.

name: Mimic
effects: Choose a Move that the target has used during the encounter. For the remainder of the encounter, that Move replaces Mimic on the user's Move List. Mimic cannot miss.

name: Mind Blown
effects: The user's Hit Points are reduced by 50% of their full Hit Point value. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented or reduced in any way.

name: Mind Reader
effects: The target becomes Read to the user until the end of the user's next turn. The user may end this effect when making an Attack on the user, causing that attack to automatically hit; OR when the Read target uses an Attack against the user, causing that attack to automatically miss. If the user has the Telepathy Capability, the user automatically succeeds on a mind- reading attempt against the target, and may listen to the target's surface thoughts as long as they remain Read. Mind Reader automatically misses against targets with the Mindlock Capability.

name: Minimize
effects: The user gains +4 Evasion, and user's size is lowered to Small for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Miracle Eye
effects: Miracle Eye may be activated as a Swift Action on the user's turn. For the rest of the turn, the user's Psychic-Type Moves can hit and affect Dark-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.

name: Mirror Coat
effects: Mirror Coat may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging Special Attack. Resolve the Triggering Attack, with Mirror Coat's user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if Mirror Coat's user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to twice the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. Note that Mirror Coat is Special, and while it cannot miss, it cannot hit targets immune to Psychic-Type Moves.

name: Mirror Move
effects: Use the Move the target has used on their last turn. You may choose new targets for the Move. Mirror Move cannot miss.

name: Mirror Shot
effects: All Legal Targets have their Accuracy lowered by -2 on 16+.

name: Mist
effects: Blessing – Any user affected by Mist may activate it when having Combat Stages lowered by any effect; if they do, those Combat Stages are instead not lowered. Mist may be activated 3 times, and then disappears.

name: Mist Ball
effects: Mist Ball lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on an Even-Numbered Roll.

name: Misty Explosion
effects: The user's Hit Points are set to -50% of their full Hit Point value. This Hit Point loss cannot be prevented or reduced in any way. After Misty Explosion is resolved, create Misty Terrain in a Blast 7, centered on the user, that lasts for 5 turns. Any creatures in those spaces are affected as if by the Field Move Misty Terrain, rather than any other Field Move.

name: Misty Terrain
effects: The area becomes Misty for 5 turns. While Misty, all Pokémon and Trainers standing on the ground ignore the first turn of all Status Afflictions, and Dragon-type attacks targeting or originating from a grounded Pokémon or Trainer take a -10 Penalty to Damage Rolls.

name: Moonblast
effects: Moonblast lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage on 15+.

name: Moongeist Beam
effects: This Move ignores any Abilities that would cause it to fail or miss, such as Dodge or Wonder Guard; those Abilities cannot be activated in response to Moongeist Beam.

name: Moonlight
effects: The user regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2/3 of its full Hit Point value. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming or Hailing the user gains 1/4 of their full Hit Point value.

name: Morning Sun
effects: The user regains Hit Points equal to half of its full Hit Point value. If it is Sunny, the user gains 2/3 of its full Hit Point value. If it is Rainy, Sand Storming or Hailing the user gains 1/4 of their full Hit Point value.

name: Mortal Spin
effects: This Move destroys all Hazards within a Burst 5 that were placed by foes, removes Leech Seeds, and removes the user's Trapped or Stuck conditions. All targets that are hit are Poisoned.

name: Mould
effects: Once a Scene, if the target has a Status Affliction, you may have this Move's Move's Damage Base be 13 instead (4d10+10 / 35).

name: Mountain Gale
effects: The target is Flinched on a 15+.

name: Mud Bomb
effects: The target's Accuracy is lowered by -1 on 16+.

name: Mud Shot
effects: The target's Speed is lowed by -1 Combat Stage.

name: Mud Sport
effects: All targets in the burst, including the user, gain a Coat which grants them 1 Step of Resistance to Electric Type Moves. After a target has been hit by a damaging Electric Type Move, the coat is removed.

name: Mud-Slap
effects: The target's Accuracy is lowered by -1.

name: Muddy Water
effects: As a Shift Action, the user may Move to any open square in Muddy Water's area of effect without provoking any Attacks of Opportunity. On 16+, the Accuracy of all targets is lowered by 1.

name: Mudslide
effects: Choose a direction. All legal targets are Pushed 2 meters in that direction.

name: Multi-Attack
effects: Multi-Attack is the same Type as the Memory Disc, Plate, or Drive Item held.

name: Mystical Fire
effects: Mystical Fire lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Mystical Power
effects: The user receives +1 Combat Stage in their highest non-HP stat.

name: Nasty Plot
effects: Raise the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages.

name: Natural Gift
effects: Refer to the Move Keywords Berry list. Natural Gift deals damage according to the Berry list and Natural Gift's Type is also defined there. The Berry's Digestion Buff is nullified and is not used.

name: Nature Power
effects: Nature Power uses a Move defined by the Environ keyword.

name: Nature's Madness
effects: The target loses 1/2 of their current Hit Points.

name: Needle Arm
effects: Needle Arm Flinches the target on 15+.

name: Night Daze
effects: Night Daze lowers the target's Accuracy by -1 on 13+.

name: Night Shade
effects: The target loses Hit Points equal to the level of Night Shade's user. Do not apply weakness or resistance. Do not apply stats.

name: Night Slash
effects: Night Slash is a Critical Hit on 18+

name: Nightmare
effects: Nightmare can only hit Legal Targets that are Asleep. The target gains Bad Sleep.

name: No Retreat
effects: The user gains +1 CS in each stat. In addition, the user may not be recalled or switched out until the end of the Scene, and counts as Slowed for the purposes of any movement that would end further away from the nearest enemy than the user started.

name: Noble Roar
effects: Noble Roar lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Noxious Torque
effects: Poisons all targets on 15+.

name: Nuzzle
effects: Nuzzle Paralyzes the target.

name: Oblivion Wing
effects: The user gains Hit Points equal to Oblivion Wing's Damage Roll.

name: Obstruct
effects: If the user is hit by a Move, the user may use Obstruct. The user is instead not hit by the Move. You do not take any damage nor are you affected by any of the Move's effects. In addition, if the triggering attack was Melee ranged, the attacker's Defense is lowered by 2 Combat Stages.

name: Occult Razor
effects: This Move automatically Critically Hits targets at or below half of their Max Hit Points. After dealing damage, the target becomes Suppressed for 1 full round.

name: Octazooka
effects: On an Even-Numbered Roll, the target's Accuracy is Lowered by 1.

name: Octolock
effects: The user initiates a Grapple Maneuver with the target, which automatically hits. If successful, until the user no longer has Dominance in the grapple, the target is Trapped and loses 1 CS in Defense and Special Defense at the end of each of their turns.

name: Odor Sleuth
effects: Odor Sleuth may be activated as a Swift Action on the user's turn. For the rest of the turn, the user's Normal-Type and Fighting-Type Moves can hit and affect Ghost-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those.

name: Ominous Wind
effects: On 19+, the user has each of its stats raised by +1 Combat Stage.

name: Order Up
effects: If the user, target, an Attached Commander or a pokemon Grappled by the user has a Food Buff, you may consume one of those Buffs (ignoring its normal trigger condition), gain its effects, and this attack is one step more effective. The target cannot activate Food Buffs in response to this Move.

name: Outrage
effects: After damage is dealt, the user becomes Enraged and Confused.

name: Overheat
effects: Lower the user's Special Attack 2 Combat Stages after damage.

name: Pain Split
effects: The user and the target both lose ½ of their current Hit Points. Add the amount of Hit Points the user and the target lost together, and divide the value by 2. Both the target and the user gain Hit Points equal to this value. Do not add Injuries from Pain Split from Hit Point Markers until the full effect of the Move has been resolved. Pain Split never causes Massive Damage. Hit Point loss from Pain Split cannot be prevented in any way

name: Parabolic Charge
effects: After the targets take damage, the user gains Hit Points equal to half of the total damage they dealt to all targets.

name: Parting Shot
effects: If Parting Shot successfully hits, the target's Attack and Special Attack stats are lowered by one Combat Stage and the user is immediately recalled in the same turn. A new Pokémon may immediately be sent out. Using Parting Shot lets a Trapped user be recalled.

name: Pay Day
effects: Pay Day scatters metal coins equal in value to 1d8 times the user's level. If it is a trainer battle, the winner of the battle gets to pick up the coins.

name: Payback

name: Perish Song
effects: Perish Song cannot miss. All targets, including the user, receive a Perish Count of 3. At the beginning of each of the target's turns, their Perish count is lowered by 1. Once a Perish Count reaches 0, set the Pokémon's Hit Points to 0. A Perish Count disappears if a target returns to their Poké Ball, Takes a Breather, or is knocked out. Perish Song never causes Massive Damage.

name: Petal Dance
effects: After damage is dealt, the user becomes Enraged and Confused.

name: Photon Geyser
effects: This attack uses the highest of the user's Attack or Special Attack Stat, though it remains a Special Move. This Move ignores any Abilities that would cause it to fail or miss, such as Dodge or Wonder Guard; those Abilities cannot be activated in response to Photon Geyser.

name: Plasma Fists
effects: The target's next damaging Normal Type Move instead becomes Electric Type.

name: Play Nice
effects: Play Nice lowers the target's Attack by 1 Combat Stage.

name: Play Rough

name: Pluck

name: Poison Gas
effects: Poison Gas Poisons all Legal Targets.

name: Poison Jab
effects: Poison Jab Poisons the target on 15+.

name: Poison Powder
effects: The target is Poisoned.

name: Poison Sting
effects: Poison Sting Poisons the target on 17+.

name: Poison Tail

name: Poltergeist
